title: SmartSave
description: GDPR-compliant smart savings app with AI-powered financial insights.
full_description: SmartSave is a GDPR-compliant smart savings application designed for users in the EU, focusing on transparency, collaboration, and security. It combines traditional savings with AI-powered financial insights via the SaveBuddy AI assistant, allowing users to manage personal and group savings easily, while keeping their data private and secure.

title: Codenames
description: Real-time multiplayer party game with WebSocket synchronization and role-based security.
full_description: A production-grade multiplayer game featuring real-time state synchronization via Django Channels and Redis-backed WebSockets. Supports concurrent game rooms with role-based data isolation (Spymaster vs Operative) enforced server-side to prevent cheating. Deployed on a Linux VPS with Nginx reverse proxy, SSL termination, and Dockerized services.

title: AI Job Applier
description: Automated job application pipeline with LLM-powered analysis and Celery workers.
full_description: A production-grade data engineering solution that automates the job application process. Built with robust Celery workers for distributed task orchestration, it features Selenium-based scrapers for targeted job extraction, data normalization pipelines, and Google Gemini API integration for intelligent resume-to-job matching and cover letter generation. Includes comprehensive Pytest coverage and Redis-backed duplicate detection for reliable, scalable operations.
